author: @sandrarose
title: Chris Brown’s Favorite Meal is Vagina (Video)
text: Chris Brown says his favorite meal is vagina. The R&B singer endeared himself to women on Twitter/X after he made the comment during an interview in Paris. Brown is in France where he’s attending Paris Fashion Week events this week. He was asked to comment on styling tips, to which he responded “Be you, don’t worry about what other people look like. Try to look like yourself.” Then Brown was asked what’s his favorite meal. Chris Brown says his favorite meal is vagina. [pic.twitter.com/0PPImsX6D6] — Daily Loud (@DailyLoud) [January 24, 2024] “He’s so real for that,” one adoring fan wrote on Twitter/X. Another fan pointed out that rapper Lil Wayne also enjoys oral s*x. A third Twitter user wrote: “You are what you eat.” Every real man’s favorite meal is pxxxy ? Listen again [pic.twitter.com/WzIaU3SfVw] — TeeTalk ? (@obajemujnr) [January 24, 2024] While oral s*x is immensely enjoyable for men and women, doctors say it can [cause oral cancer](//www.webmd.com/oral-health/oral-hpv-cancer). Research shows a link between the human papillomavirus (HPV) and cancers of the mouth and throat. About 7% of Americans have oral HPV, while [genital HPV](//www.webmd.com/oral-health/oral-hpv-cancer) is the most common sexually transmitted disease in the U.S. The immune system fights the virus and most people don’t show symptoms. But if the immune system can’t fight the virus, it can cause cervical and oral cancers. Cancers usually develop in the throat, at the back of the roof of the mouth, or at the base of the tongue, according to [WebMD](https://www.webmd.com/oral-health/oral-hpv-cancer). You can be infected for 10 years or more before a cancer develops. Men are three times more likely to get cancer from HPV than women. The cancers are most common in people under age 60, especially those in their 30s and 40s.
